fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Protect your target at night. They will be healed and cleansed. You may use this while dead. (2 uses)
- Attack your target at night. You may use this while dead. (1 use)
- Before Day 4, you may choose to switch your target during the day. You may not use this if your target already died. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will be given a randomly chosen target without any defense. They also can't be yourself.
- You will know who visits your target if it's the second or more time that they've visited.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure your target lives until Day 4, then ensure they die before the game ends.
